short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Perform advanced search operations with various Google search operators.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search Operators Analyzer is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help users get the most out of Google search by using advanced Google search operators. This tool makes it easy to apply powerful search commands to get highly targeted and relevant results. Whether you are an SEO expert, digital marketer, researcher, or student, this extension saves time and effort by allowing you to:

- Use the "site:" operator to search within a specific website for precise information.
- Access Google's cached version of pages instantly with the "cache:" operator.
- Find similar websites easily using the "related:" operator.
- Search specific keywords in titles, URLs, or the text with operators like "intitle:", "inurl:", and more.
- Execute searches instantly with just one click 

Key Features:

- Intuitive UI that feels native to Google, featuring a minimal, clean, and Material Design-inspired layout.
- Enter queries in the input fields and simply click the search icon to execute the Google search using advanced operators.
- Includes a wide range of Google search operators: "site:", "intitle:", "inurl:", "allintitle:", "related:", "cache:", and many more.
- This extension is the perfect companion for SEO professionals, digital marketers, researchers, and anyone looking to use Google search operators effectively to get precise and relevant results.

Why Use Search Operators Analyzer?

- Save Time: Use quick access to Google search operators for efficient web searching.
- Advanced Google Searches: Improve the relevance and accuracy of your search results with powerful search commands.
- User-Friendly Interface: A simple, easy-to-use interface designed to help you navigate and apply advanced Google search operators effortlessly.

If you are looking for a tool to boost your productivity by making Google searches more precise, Search Operators Analyzer is the perfect Chrome extension for you. Start optimizing your searches today and harness the full power of Google search operators!
